Thanks a bunch for this one. 
One question: this game wants to do a update on my system (I have LT 3.0 and dashboard 15574). Is it safe to do so?! I dont want my system to be f****d up  :-( 
Thanks in advance for your help.

@ Rubbebubbe... I just came on TPB for the same answer to your question...since there were none at the time I went ahead and accepted the update (holding my breathe in a very noobish way :D) I'm glad to report back to you and everyone else that the update was a SYSTEM update and it updated the dash (namely added some extra options on the dash) however it still played the game and didn't flash the drive from the game disc.  To double check, I had a back up of the game, "Alan Wake" and that also works!!!  So yes, it did update the dash, but games still work and I did have the same as you LT 3.0 and dashboard 15574.  Just wanted to help you and everyone else out as selecting "YES" to that update scared me LOL :D  Happy gaming and thanks to Drarbg for the upload!!!  (PS: game works 100%)...now off to playing :D
